originalText.text: Literally the most professional event planning company you can find in NYC. I was eagerly trying to prepare for a company event that was happening in 10 days, and I am SO grateful that I came across EMRG Media. I have never planned for such a big event with over 50 guests, Erica and her team was super patient and helpful throughout the short 10 days we had to prepare. EMRG helped us from contacting venues and setting menus, to arranging DJ’s and Emcees. I can’t emphasize enough how successful our event went and how happy everyone was with the outcome. Thank you so much to the team at EMRG for making this night memorable! If you’re looking for a professional event planning team that will help you every step of the way to prepare for a successful event, I would highly recommend choosing EMRG.

originalText.text:
I couldn't have worked with a better team than EMRG for my event at Nebula in Midtown Manhattan. Erica and her team were invaluable for our recent 400-person gala. Their dedication and attention to detail were outstanding. From the initial planning stages to the event execution, they were with us every step of the way, ensuring everything ran seamlessly.

Communication was a breeze, with Erica and the team always available for calls, texts, and emails. During the event, they were everywhere, ensuring every aspect was perfect and going above and beyond to exceed our expectations. I was referred to Erica and the team by a close friend who claimed she 'is one of the best in the business.' After our event, I couldn’t agree more with that statement. Looking forward to working with Erica and the team again very soon!

originalText.text:
10/10 would recommend! Great experience working with Erica and team to ensure we had a seamless holiday party for about 900 people. Erica was available to help with every step along the way and help bring to our attention additional ideas, needs and considerations to help make our party a huge success! Her team went above and beyond on the day of to ensure all of the final touches were handled and it allowed for our internal planning team to be able to sit back and enjoy the party. Great at communicating and sourcing vendors at a great rate due to their connections within the industry.

Looking forward to working with EMRG Media again in the future!

originalText.text:
THANK YOU to Erica, Catherine, and the entire EMRG Media team for organizing our annual medical school holiday party! I have worked with Erica for years, and every party has been absolutely amazing. They are genuine pros at event planning and make sure that the event is as perfect as possible. They are incredibly attentive to requests and the events can be customized for whichever group or institution you are a member of. Ease of communication with the EMRG Media team is another huge plus!

Our past three parties have been at Nebula, which has perfectly suited our needs. And our most recent party with the EMRG Media team and Nebula was probably one of the best parties that we have ever had (which is super impressive after many years of holding this holiday party). The music, food, drinks, and venue have all been praised by students. I ABSOLUTELY recommend working with Erica, Catherine, and the EMRG Media team!

originalText.text: Erica and Catherine from ERMG Media created the ABSOLUTE BEST party at Nebula for our sons Bar Mitzvah. Our guests all left saying it was the most fun event they have ever been to and that is saying A LOT! They are easy to work with, not pushy, have amazing ideas and give access to the best people in the industry! We highly recommend this detailed oriented team to pull together an event you will never forget! We loved them so much that we will be using them again in 2 years for our daughters Mitzvah!
